description: Developing custom enterprise solutions with AI-driven features including OCR and automated payment reconciliation. Led Go-Live for multiple enterprise projects (CSA, Qoala, JAPFA). Recognized with 'User is Our Boss' award for customer focus.

Developed and maintained a microservice architecture containing nine services for a fast-growing SaaS platform. Implemented best practices with Go, gRPC, and Kubernetes while collaborating with cross-functional teams.

Developed hotel agent integration project using Go, enabling platform expansion. Designed data synchronization between ElasticSearch and MySQL using NSQ. Conducted unit and integration testing with monitoring via NewRelic and Jenkins.
Created GraphQL API backend from scratch for scheduling financial planner feature using Go. Implemented JWT authentication system and developed frontend admin dashboard using SvelteJS.
